00035         template <typename T, precision P>
00036         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER GLM_CONSTEXPR int tdualquat<T, P>::length() const
00037         {
00038                 return 8;
00039         }

00042         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tdualquat<T, P>::tdualquat() :
00043                 real(tquat<T, P>()),
00044                 dual(tquat<T, P>(T(0), T(0), T(0), T(0)))

00053                 dual(tquat<T, P>(T(0), T(0), T(0), T(0)))

00056         template <typename T, precision P>
00057         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tdualquat<T, P>::tdualquat
00058         (
00059                 tquat<T, P> const & r,
00060                 tquat<T, P> const & d
00061         ) :
00062                 real(r),
00063                 dual(d)

00065 
00066         template <typename T, precision P>
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tdualquat<T, P>::tdualquat
00068         (
00069                 tquat<T, P> const & q,
00070                 tvec3<T, P> const& p
00071         ) :
00072                 real(q),
00073                 dual(
00074                         T(-0.5) * ( p.x*q.x + p.y*q.y + p.z*q.z),
00075                         T(+0.5) * ( p.x*q.w + p.y*q.z - p.z*q.y),
00076                         T(+0.5) * (-p.x*q.z + p.y*q.w + p.z*q.x),
00077                         T(+0.5) * ( p.x*q.y - p.y*q.x + p.z*q.w))
00078         {}

00146         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tdualquat<T, P> operator-
00147         (

00149         )

00154         template <typename T, precision P>
00155         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tdualquat<T, P> operator+
00156         (
00157                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q,
00158                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & p
00159         )
00160         {
00161                 return detail::tdualquat<T, P>(q.real + p.real,q.dual + p.dual);
00162         }

00164         template <typename T, precision P>
00165         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tdualquat<T, P> operator*
00166         (
00167                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & p,
00168                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & o
00169         )
00170         {
00171                 return detail::tdualquat<T, P>(p.real * o.real,p.real * o.dual + p.dual * o.real);
00172         }

00174         // Transformation
00175         template <typename T, precision P>
00176         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> operator*
00177         (
00178                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q,
00179                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v
00180         )
00181         {
00182                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const real_v3(q.real.x,q.real.y,q.real.z);
00183                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const dual_v3(q.dual.x,q.dual.y,q.dual.z);
00184                 return (cross(real_v3, cross(real_v3,v) + v * q.real.w + dual_v3) + dual_v3 * q.real.w - real_v3 * q.dual.w) * T(2) + v;
00185         }
00186 
00187         template <typename T, precision P>
00188         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> operator*
00189         (
00190                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v,
00191                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q
00192         )
00193         {
00194                 return glm::inverse(q) * v;
00195         }

00198         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<T, P> operator*

00201                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const & v
00202         )
00203         {
00204                 return detail::tvec4<T, P>(q * detail::tvec3<T, P>(v), v.w);

00248         // Boolean operators
00249         template <typename T, precision P>
00250         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator==
00251         (
00252                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q1,
00253                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q2
00254         )
00255         {
00256                 return (q1.real == q2.real) && (q1.dual == q2.dual);
00257         }
00258 
00259         template <typename T, precision P>
00260         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator!=
00261         (
00262                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q1,
00263                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q2
00264         )
00265         {
00266                 return (q1.real != q2.dual) || (q1.real != q2.dual);
00267         }

00271         template <typename T, precision P>
00272         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tdualquat<T, P> normalize
00273         (
00274                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q
00275         )
00276         {
00277                 return q / length(q.real);
00278         }

00280         template <typename T, precision P>
00281         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tdualquat<T, P> lerp
00282         (
00283                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & x,
00284                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & y,
00285                 T const & a
00286         )
00287         {
00288                 // Dual Quaternion Linear blend aka DLB:
00289                 // Lerp is only defined in [0, 1]
00290                 assert(a >= static_cast<T>(0));
00291                 assert(a <= static_cast<T>(1));
00292                 T const k = dot(x.real,y.real) < static_cast<T>(0) ? -a : a;
00293                 T const one(1);
00294                 return detail::tdualquat<T, P>(x * (one - a) + y * k);
00295         }
00296 
00297         template <typename T, precision P>
00298         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tdualquat<T, P> inverse
00299         (
00300                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & q
00301         )
00302         {
00303                 const glm::detail::tquat<T, P> real = conjugate(q.real);
00304                 const glm::detail::tquat<T, P> dual = conjugate(q.dual);
00305                 return detail::tdualquat<T, P>(real, dual + (real * (-2.0f * dot(real,dual))));
00306         }
00307 
00308         template <typename T, precision P>
00309         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat2x4<T, P> mat2x4_cast
00310         (
00311                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & x
00312         )
00313         {
00314                 return detail::tmat2x4<T, P>( x[0].x, x[0].y, x[0].z, x[0].w, x[1].x, x[1].y, x[1].z, x[1].w );
00315         }
00316 
00317         template <typename T, precision P>
00318         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x4<T, P> mat3x4_cast
00319         (
00320                 detail::tdualquat<T, P> const & x
00321         )
00322         {
00323                 detail::tquat<T, P> r = x.real / length2(x.real);
00324                 
00325                 detail::tquat<T, P> const rr(r.w * x.real.w, r.x * x.real.x, r.y * x.real.y, r.z * x.real.z);
00326                 r *= static_cast<T>(2);
00327                 
00328                 T const xy = r.x * x.real.y;
00329                 T const xz = r.x * x.real.z;
00330                 T const yz = r.y * x.real.z;
00331                 T const wx = r.w * x.real.x;
00332                 T const wy = r.w * x.real.y;
00333                 T const wz = r.w * x.real.z;
00334                 
00335                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const a(
00336                         rr.w + rr.x - rr.y - rr.z,
00337                         xy - wz,
00338                         xz + wy,
00339                         -(x.dual.w * r.x - x.dual.x * r.w + x.dual.y * r.z - x.dual.z * r.y));
00340                 
00341                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const b(
00342                         xy + wz,
00343                         rr.w + rr.y - rr.x - rr.z,
00344                         yz - wx,
00345                         -(x.dual.w * r.y - x.dual.x * r.z - x.dual.y * r.w + x.dual.z * r.x));
00346                 
00347                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const c(
00348                         xz - wy,
00349                         yz + wx,
00350                         rr.w + rr.z - rr.x - rr.y,
00351                         -(x.dual.w * r.z + x.dual.x * r.y - x.dual.y * r.x - x.dual.z * r.w));
00352                 
00353                 return detail::tmat3x4<T, P>(a, b, c);
00354         }
00355 
00356         template <typename T, precision P>
00357         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tdualquat<T, P> dualquat_cast
00358         (
00359                 detail::tmat2x4<T, P> const & x
00360         )
00361         {
00362                 return detail::tdualquat<T, P>(
00363                         detail::tquat<T, P>( x[0].w, x[0].x, x[0].y, x[0].z ),
00364                         detail::tquat<T, P>( x[1].w, x[1].x, x[1].y, x[1].z ));
00365         }
00366 
00367         template <typename T, precision P>
00368         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tdualquat<T, P> dualquat_cast
00369         (
00370                 detail::tmat3x4<T, P> const & x
00371         )
00372         {
00373                 detail::tquat<T, P> real;
00374                 
00375                 T const trace = x[0].x + x[1].y + x[2].z;
00376                 if(trace > T(0))
00377                 {
00378                         T const r = sqrt(T(1) + trace);
00379                         T const invr = static_cast<T>(0.5) / r;
00380                         real.w = static_cast<T>(0.5) * r;
00381                         real.x = (x[2].y - x[1].z) * invr;
00382                         real.y = (x[0].z - x[2].x) * invr;
00383                         real.z = (x[1].x - x[0].y) * invr;
00384                 }
00385                 else if(x[0].x > x[1].y && x[0].x > x[2].z)
00386                 {
00387                         T const r = sqrt(T(1) + x[0].x - x[1].y - x[2].z);
00388                         T const invr = static_cast<T>(0.5) / r;
00389                         real.x = static_cast<T>(0.5)*r;
00390                         real.y = (x[1].x + x[0].y) * invr;
00391                         real.z = (x[0].z + x[2].x) * invr;
00392                         real.w = (x[2].y - x[1].z) * invr;
00393                 }
00394                 else if(x[1].y > x[2].z)
00395                 {
00396                         T const r = sqrt(T(1) + x[1].y - x[0].x - x[2].z);
00397                         T const invr = static_cast<T>(0.5) / r;
00398                         real.x = (x[1].x + x[0].y) * invr;
00399                         real.y = static_cast<T>(0.5) * r;
00400                         real.z = (x[2].y + x[1].z) * invr;
00401                         real.w = (x[0].z - x[2].x) * invr;
00402                 }
00403                 else
00404                 {
00405                         T const r = sqrt(T(1) + x[2].z - x[0].x - x[1].y);
00406                         T const invr = static_cast<T>(0.5) / r;
00407                         real.x = (x[0].z + x[2].x) * invr;
00408                         real.y = (x[2].y + x[1].z) * invr;
00409                         real.z = static_cast<T>(0.5) * r;
00410                         real.w = (x[1].x - x[0].y) * invr;
00411                 }
00412                 
00413                 detail::tquat<T, P> dual;
00414                 dual.x =  T(0.5) * ( x[0].w * real.w + x[1].w * real.z - x[2].w * real.y);
00415                 dual.y =  T(0.5) * (-x[0].w * real.z + x[1].w * real.w + x[2].w * real.x);
00416                 dual.z =  T(0.5) * ( x[0].w * real.y - x[1].w * real.x + x[2].w * real.w);
00417                 dual.w = -T(0.5) * ( x[0].w * real.x + x[1].w * real.y + x[2].w * real.z);
00418                 return detail::tdualquat<T, P>(real, dual);
00419         }
